ampvis2
  • Get Started
  • Reference

Generate a function table

Generate a function table that is sorted based on an input heatmap.

amp_function(heatmap)

Arguments

heatmap

(required) A heatmap generated by amp_heatmap.
functions

A data frame that associates functions with a genus names (default: "MiDAS").
adjust.bottom

Adjust the whitespace added in the bottom of the plot in mm (default: 10).
adjust.top

Adjust the whitespace added in the bottom of the plot in mm (default: 0).
genus.pos

Specify which part of the name that contains the genus name (default: 1).
point.size

Size of the plotted points (default: 6)
selection

A vector with the functions to be displayed. (default: c("MiDAS","FIL", "AOB", "NOB", "PAO", "GAO").

Value

A ggplot2 object.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
